document.full_text: david ortiz hit a two-run homer and jonathan papelbon labored through the ninth inning as the boston red sox beat the new york yankees.
document.title: ortiz, lester help red sox close in on yankees in al east
lines_and_colors: david ortiz hit a two-run homer and jonathan papelbon labored through the ninth inning as the boston red sox beat the new york yankees.
